compatibility.notes: The Condor-1.1 license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the Condor Public License in redistributions.
Include a notice in user documentation acknowledging the Condor Project.
Acknowledge the use of the Software in academic publications.
license.name: Condor-1.1
obligations: Redistributions must reproduce the Condor Public License in the Software and any user documentation.
User documentation must include a notice acknowledging the use of Condor Project software.
Academic reports or publications must acknowledge the use of the Software with an appropriate citation.
